name: HerrAnwalt: Lawyers Legacy
description:
You Play the German lawyer and Influencer: “Mr Lawyer” who needs to save students from the cruelty of an evil Headmaster. What started as a harmless mission ends up him sending you back to the school desk. Now you not only have to save the students, but to survive a complete school day fighting a variety of teachers.

This game is an action platformer with a pixel-art style.

Features
  • Single player Story Mode
  • Endless Figthing Arena
  • Controller support


Fight the teachers in this fast-paced action games, save the students and defeat the evil headmaster. Or will the school trauma get you?
